CommerceEntitlementPolicyShare.name: CommerceEntitlementPolicyShare
CommerceEntitlementPolicyShare.description: Represents the entitlement rule for sharing products and prices with users other than the owner.

AccessLevel.description: Possible values are: All—Owner Edit—Read/Write Read—Read Only

ParentId.description: The unique ID of the parent entitlement policy.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserOrGroupId.description: The unique ID of the associated user or buyer group.
